University Teknologi Malaysia (UTM), an innovation-led and graduate-focused Research University. It is located both in Kuala Lumpur, the capital city of Malaysia and Johor Bahru, the southern city in Iskandar Malaysia, which is a vibrant economic corridor in the south of Peninsular Malaysia. 

The divine law of Allah is the foundation for science and technology. UTM strives with total and unified effort to attain excellence and technology for universal peace and prosperity in accordance with His will.

**UTM Students MOOC Credit Transfer Process**

For UTM students, credit transfer can be applied at your Faculty/School upon completing your MOOC. Visit: [https://utmcdex.utm.my/moocs-utm/](https://utmlead.utm.my/moocs-utm/)
 to know more.

If you have any inquiries, please email us at utm-mooc  [**utm-mooc@utm.my**](mailto:utm-mooc@utm.my)
. We will respond within 3 working days.

LIBRARY SKILLS

UTM Library conducts Library Skills programs with the purpose of guiding students and staff to enhance their information searching and retrieval skills, fostering information literacy crucial for education and research in science, technology, and engineering. We also offer a variety of other services to researchers, academicians, and students.

Categories
----------

#### Micro credential courses are certification of learning that we offer to a smaller set of courses or modules which are designed to provide learners with knowledge, skills, values and competencies in a narrow area of study and/or practice.

Soft Skills Development Courses

Career and Industry Specific Course

Professional Certification Course

Language & Communication

Education

Business

Engineering

Math and Science

Surveying

Computer Science

Technology and Information

Human Resource

Packages
--------

### Mudahnya AutoCAD 2D bersama Dr A

Kursus hand-ons ini merupakan siri pembelajaran sepanjang hayat kepada semua golongan yang ingin menambah kemahiran kendiri termasuklah pelajar, guru, juruteknik, jurutera, pengamal kejuruteraan dan orang awam.

*   RM270 (MYR)
    
*   Delivered online
*   3 courses

[Find out more](https://mooc.utm.my/qualifications/autocad-dr-a/)

### Process Integration Series: Pinch Analysis

*   RM1,400 (MYR)
    
*   Delivered online
*   10 courses

[Find out more](https://mooc.utm.my/qualifications/process-integration/)

### Soil Mechanics

The learners will learn the basics of soil components and conditions from an engineering perspective.

*   RM180 (MYR)
    
*   Delivered online
*   4 courses

[Find out more](https://mooc.utm.my/qualifications/soil-mechanics/)

FAQs
----

How can I apply for MOOC Credit Transfer at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia?

If you are a UTM registered students and would like to apply for credit transfer through MOOC, please access the following link: [https://utmcdex.utm.my/moocs-utm/](https://utmcdex.utm.my/moocs-utm/)
